entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean up WinForms BlazorWebView IsAncestorSiteInDesignMode usage #3173
  • CSC : warning CS8785: Generator 'CodeBehindGenerator' failed to generate source. It will not contribute to the output and compilation errors may occ #3171
  • [Net6][iOS] error MSB4044: The "ComputeBundleResourceOutputPaths" task was not given a value for the required parameter "BundleIdentifier". #3170
  • Which version of Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK for Maui Single project? #3169
  • VS Pro 2022 Preview 5 & MAUI project not loading properly #3168
  • "Unable to load DLL 'Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Text.dll'" debugging MAUI app on Windows Machine #3167
  • Add support for unpackaged apps #3166
  • [Bug] Essentials Connectivity throws on older macOS versions #3164
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Bug] HandlerChanged is not invoked when delete/dispose a View #3163
  • [Bug] CollectionView Crash on Android using a custom header #3162
  • [Bug] Error loading images on Windows #3160
  • [Bug] Not able to add axml files #3159

Closed

  • Load BlazorWebView HostPage from embedded resource? #3103
  • [Bug] [iOS] Storyboard not being generated, app layout is wrong. #2787
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] "Android Emulator" option does not appear in VS 2022 P6. #3110

PullRequests

Created

  • Set up for unpackaged app projects #3172
  • Clean up Shell Chrome Behaviors #3165
    area/shell 🐢
  • [compatibility] IsTrimmable support, fix linker warnings #3161

Merged

  • Prep Update to WASDK Preview 3 #3153
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add ContainerView to Layout if it's present #3151
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3155
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix iOS splash screens in partial builds #3152
    6.0.101-preview.10

Updated

  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Use Essentials over the old Device class #2488
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Start to remove old things in Maui #2266
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Try using an internal feed on DevDiv #3128
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls #3141
  • Use the default Button theme #1698
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Housekeeping] Add pending Core interfaces comments #3146
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Implement Invalidate method in GraphicsView #3142
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
